message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with!
I'll give you 40, a fair deal!
I'll give you 55, but I think I deserve a bit more
I'll give you 58, but I think we can do better
I'll give you 62, but I think we're getting close to a deal
Last chance, take 10 or walk away!
I'll give you 65, but I'm not sure we'll get a better deal
You're running out of time, take 5 or nothing!
I'll give you 68, but I'm not sure I can do better
Take 1, it's the best I can do, or we both get nothing!
